question: A restaurant has placed an advertisement for a manager in the local newspaper.Write a letter to the restaurant, applying for the job. In your letter:explain what you are currently doingdescribe your suitability for this jobTell them  when you are free to attend an interview
text: I am writing this letter to inform you that I have done my Masters in hotel management from a reputed Delhi university college and currently I am working in a cafe as a manager.I have 5 years of work experience in this industry.

The region where I am presently working is indeed  very far from my home. As a result ,I have to spend a  lot of time and money on travel. So I want to shift my job and the area  where your premises   is quite near my home .Thus I can do night shits also.I am quite interested in working in your venue and moreover, it's a big chain of restaurants so I can learn more and can apply my skills over there in a better way .

As you know I am a working professional and working from morning to evening ,so I am free on weekends or  after 6 o'clock for the interview .Please inform me if  for the interview time and I will come along with my CV and necessary documents. I am also emailing them to you at the address given in the advertisement.
I hope to hear your reply soon.
